title: Project Skins Are There But Can't Purchase?
body:
So the new project skins are now in the game from a tiny update I got this morning but I still cannot purchase them? Does anybody know when these skins are going to be released for purchase? 

I WANT TO GIVE YOU MY MONEY RIOT

replies.body:
As the [6.15 patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-615-notes#patch-upcoming-skins) state, the new PROJECT skins are slated to be released during this patch. I super hyped for these skins as well, so, for now, I recommend keeping your eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement of their release.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
